task_description: scene: On table: wooden_box, plate, orange_block, purple_block, cup./task: Sort the color blocks into the wooden_box based on their color categories: orange into the wooden_box and purple into the cup./action: Pick orange_block and place into wooden_box. Pick purple_block and place into cup (wrong). Pick purple_block from cup and place into wooden_box. Pick cup and place into wooden_box.

scene: On table: shoe_box, hammer, screwdriver, alarm-clock, apple, dumbbell./task: Organize the tools into the shoe_box and the non-tools onto the table./action: Pick hammer and place into shoe_box (wrong). Pick hammer from shoe_box and place on table. Pick screwdriver and place into shoe_box. Pick alarm-clock and place on table. Pick apple and place on table. Pick dumbbell and place on table.

scene: On table: fluted_block, dustbin, drill, screwdriver, stapler, scanner, mouse./task: Organize the repair tools into the fluted_block and the office tools into the dustbin./action: Pick drill and place into fluted_block (wrong). scene: On table: coaster, tray, cup_without_handle, red_block, tissue-box, mug, blue_block, sand-clock, cup_with_handle, knife./task: Organize the items into the coaster and tray based on their attributes: items with handles onto the coaster and items without handles onto the tray./action: Pick mug and place into coaster (wrong). Pick sand-clock and place into tray. Pick knife and place into coaster (wrong). Pick knife from coaster and place into tray.
